metadata.synopsis: Lorin has been ordered to stay in the corner by the hag. The player has forced him out, and he is absolutely panicking - he knows the hag will punish him. He calls out, begging for forgiveness before clutching his heart as he experiences a massive heart attack and collapses on the floor - dead.

0.speaker: Lorin
0.text: No, Ethel! I'm sorry! I'll go back! Argh.
